EmailTemplate.name: 17.CEM.CXS.none.L.G.E.2450.Email 5 - SMP Datasheet
EmailTemplate.subject: Self-optimizing workflows boost customer care
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Seize the Opportunity of Omni-Channel Care Nokia provides a cornerstone for omni-channel success Unified omni-channel services can improve customer care and lower call center OPEX. The Bell Labs innovation powered capabilities of Nokia Service Management Platform build a foundation for an agile omni-channel customer experience strategy. Explore the Service Management Platform datasheet to learn how omni-channel solves customer challenges and develop a strategy to innovate customer service. Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
